title: All You Need to Know About ZenFone 3 Max | ASUS
description:
ZenFone 3 Max is the 5.5-inch smartphone eliminates battery life worries, with enough power to get you through a full work day, and even beyond! With its high-capacity 4100mAh cell ZenFone 3 Max just keeps on going, with standby that lasts up to 38 days both. We all need more time to talk, connect, play and watch without running out of power. We all need ZenFone 3 Max.

ZenFone 3 Max’s 4100mAh battery capacity is so substantial that it’s able to double up as a power bank to charge your digital devices. So, no need to worry when your other gadgets run out of juice: just hook them up to ZenFone 3 Max and top up on the go!

ZenFone 3 Max’s 16MP PixelMaster camera that captures beautiful, high-resolution photos with zero shutter lag. The rear-facing 16MP camera takes astounding images, and the 8MP front camera shoots sharp selfies and clear video chats.
